p: We compared m6A methylation peaks at each site in MH7A cells after stimulation with TNF-α. The differences and overlaps in m6A methylation between the individuals are shown by the Venn diagram in Figure 2A. We found 13,763 m6A peaks in the control group and 13,621 m6A peaks in the TNF-α group, of which 12,896 m6A peaks were common between the two groups. Compared with the control group, 725 peaks appeared and 867 peaks disappeared in the TNF-α group, indicating that there was a significant difference in the m6A modification pattern of MH7A cells after stimulation with TNF-α.
